dashboard.manageLegacy: Manage your digital legacy with confidence.
dashboard.createFirstWill: Create your first digital will to get started.
dashboard.addRecipientsToWill: Add recipients to your will to get started.
dashboard.tutorialSubtitle: Follow these simple steps to create and manage your digital will

tutorial.createWillDescription: Choose your preferred method to create your will - audio, video, or chat-based.
tutorial.createWillStep1: Click 'New Will' or go to Create section
tutorial.createWillStep2: Select Audio, Video, or Chat option
tutorial.addAssetsDescription: List all your assets including property, investments, vehicles, and more.
tutorial.addAssetsStep1: Go to Assets section from Quick Actions
tutorial.addAssetsStep3: Fill in asset details and save
tutorial.createRecipientsDescription: Add the people who will receive your assets and messages.
tutorial.createRecipientsStep3: Enter name, email, phone, and relationship
tutorial.assignRecipientsDescription: Link your assets to the recipients who should receive them.
tutorial.reviewFinalizeDescription: Review all sections of your will and finalize it.

recipients.title: Recipients
recipients.addFirstRecipient: Add your first recipient to get started
recipients.specifyWhoReceives: Specify who will receive your assets and messages.
recipients.addPeopleWhoReceive: Add the people who will receive your legacy.

verifyRecipient.pleaseWait: Please wait while we verify your identity...
verifyRecipient.identityVerified: Your identity has been successfully verified. You have been confirmed as a recipient.
verifyRecipient.invalidOrExpired: The verification link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new verification email.
verifyRecipient.missingParameters: The verification link is missing required parameters. Please check your email and try again.
verifyRecipient.codeExpiredMessage: This verification link has expired. Please request a new verification email.
verifyRecipient.rateLimitExceeded: Too many verification attempts. Please try again later.

willDetail.willNotFoundDescription: The will you're looking for doesn't exist or you don't have access to it.
willDetail.contentDescription: The full content of your will
willDetail.audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support the audio element.
willDetail.videoNotSupported: Your browser does not support the video element.
willDetail.noContentDescription: This will doesn't have any content yet. Start creating your will to add content.

login.signInToManage: Sign in to manage your digital legacy
login.joinThousands: Join thousands of families who trust LegacyVault to protect what matters most.
login.fillAllFields: Please fill in all required fields
login.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
login.emailExists: An account with this email already exists
login.passwordLeaked: This password has been found in a data breach. Please choose a different password.
login.passwordLeakedMultiple: This password has been found in multiple data breaches and is not secure. Please choose a different password.

resetPassword.passwordLeaked: This password has been found in a data breach. Please choose a different password.
resetPassword.passwordLeakedMultiple: This password has been found in multiple data breaches and is not secure. Please choose a different password.

hero.createManageShare: Create, manage, and share your digital will with complete peace of mind. Record your last wishes via audio, video, or chat—all encrypted and legally guided.
hero.demoDescription: Watch how LegacyVault helps you create and manage your digital will.

footer.description: Secure your legacy with modern digital will management. Peace of mind for you and your loved ones.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Everything You Need to Secure Your Legacy
features.description: Create your digital will in the way that feels most natural to you—audio, video, or text.
features.audioDescription: Record your wishes naturally with your voice. Our AI transcribes and organizes everything.
features.videoDescription: Create personal video messages for your loved ones to be shared when the time is right.
features.chatDescription: Prefer typing? Our guided chat helps you create your will step by step.
features.assetDescription: Organize and categorize all your assets—property, investments, digital assets, and more.
features.recipientDescription: Secure access for beneficiaries with verification and controlled release of information.
features.notificationsDescription: Automated reminders to keep your will updated and notify recipients when needed.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Create Your Will in Minutes
howItWorks.description: A simple four-step process designed to be completed in under 10 minutes.
howItWorks.step1Description: Sign up securely with email, phone, or your favorite social account. Your data is protected from day one.
howItWorks.step2Description: Choose audio, video, or chat to express your final wishes. Our AI helps organize and structure everything.
howItWorks.step3Description: Add beneficiaries and specify what each person receives. Set conditions and delivery preferences.
howItWorks.step4Description: Your will is encrypted and stored securely. Recipients are notified when the time comes.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: Trusted by Families Everywhere
testimonials.description: See why thousands have chosen LegacyVault to secure their legacy.
testimonials.testimonial1Content: LegacyVault gave me peace of mind I didn't know I was missing. Recording my wishes through video felt so personal and meaningful.
testimonials.testimonial2Content: Managing assets across different categories was seamless. The interface is intuitive, and the security features are top-notch.
testimonials.testimonial3Content: I recommend LegacyVault to all my clients. It's the most comprehensive yet accessible digital will platform I've seen.

cta.joinThousands: Join thousands of families who trust LegacyVault to protect what matters most. Create your first will in under 10 minutes.
cta.noCreditCard: No credit card required • Free plan available • Cancel anytime
